content.raw:
Is there an easy way to explain this interpretation of drag force?  I don’t have the Catto reference you mention.

* I can see that utility in having the force be modulated by the ratio of submerged/total volume, but why would total mass of the object matter?   Perhaps as a way to limit the consequential acceleration?
* It appears you are using a fixed total mass of 2 kg?
content.html:
Is there an easy way to explain this interpretation of drag force? I don’t have the Catto reference you mention.

  • I can see that utility in having the force be modulated by the ratio of submerged/total volume, but why would total mass of the object matter? Perhaps as a way to limit the consequential acceleration?
  • It appears you are using a fixed total mass of 2 kg?
